projects.name: MathNinja
projects.description: A simple cross-platform game allowing children to practice their basic arithmetic skills. Has been used in school districts across the United States.

projects.name: Blend: Fruity Insanity!
projects.description: A fast paced matching game involving fruits of different colors getting matched into the correct sectors. Made in collaboration with MakeGamesWithUs.

projects.name: Paychecks
projects.description: Send money over SMS. Built during HSHacks 2014. Won Venmo API Prize.

projects.name: Octo
projects.description: iOS game involving colored octagons and swift reflexes. Written in first week following Swift release.

projects.name: India News
projects.description: Newly designed version of the popular Indian news site. Built in collaboration with Ketan Kothari.

projects.name: Hiruko
projects.description: iOS app for local taekwondo school. Provides access to schedules, real-time announcements, and sparring gear purchases.

projects.name: Omnus
projects.description: Twilio-based service that allows one to stream music. Top 10 at MHacks V with Tejas Manohar. 200+ stars on GitHub.

projects.name: PartySync
projects.description: Turntable.fm for YouTube videos. Originally built at YCHacks 2014.

projects.name: WWDC 2015
projects.description: (Winning) application for the Apple WWDC 2015 Student Scholarship.

projects.name: WWDCScholars
projects.description: Portfolio of successful 2015 WWDC Scholarship applications. Built at WWDC.

projects.name: Ringo
projects.description: API and web client built around Xcode. Allows for in-browser native iOS app development.

projects.name: Kenko
projects.description: Take a picture of some food, and get its nutrition facts. Top 10 + Best Cloud-based App with Kevin Frans at PennApps XII.
